arStrings.szText: The potency of your Healing Potion can be upgraded at the {icon:Marker_Crafter_Alchemist, 2.0}{c_highlight}Alchemist{/c}. Upgrading will require gold and herbs collected from around the world.
Healing Potion Capacity can be increased by earning {c_highlight}Renown{/c} in each Region of Sanctuary. Region Renown can be viewed on the map.
